p: For this analysis, we used the A6 sequences obtained in this study; worldwide HIV-1 A sequences ( n = 58), A1 sequences ( n = 319), A2 sequences ( n = 7), A3 sequences ( n = 9), A4 sequences ( n = 3), and A6 sequences ( n = 370) obtained from the Los Alamos HIV Database ( www.hiv.lanl.gov accessed 23 March 2020).
